__e: It took even longer to get that goddamn door open.
And the whole time, you've been doing me like this. I've been too polite to point out that at any time I want to, I could kick this damn door to splinters.
Now, if only I brought something to get through that bloody door.
Damnedest thing I ever did see.
What's this fucking thing on my head? I don't know.
I can take whatever I want from you and there's not a goddamn thing you could say about it.
There's nothing wrong with the bloody thing.
I can take whatever I want from you and there's not a goddamn thing you could say about it.
You're not the one that does a damn thing for anyone.
So you sleep with some girl and start a goddamn gang war, man, really?
For the first time in this bloody conflict, we have the numbers... nearly 6,000 to their 1,500.
At the rate this is going, this whole goddamn war will be over without us firing a goddamn shot.
You either have something against Jane or something against me, because that woman is damned if she does and damned if she doesn't with you.
I'll be darned if I'll let you ride me anymore.
You either have something against Jane or something against me, because that woman is damned if she does and damned if she doesn't with you.
My kid almost died because of your damn car!
I swear to God, if you don't tell me where to find my goddamn car...
I mean how is he supposed to let Jessica go when, thanks to you, everyday, he has to come to work and stare at a damn machine that can go back in time and bring his wife back to life?
He always wants to hang out, and I just want to get the hell out of his house.
This has always been about you and the career that you didn't have and the money that you didn't make and the fact that my mother bought us that fucking house!
And it isn't my fault that you dropped out of school, and it isn't my fault that you chose to never leave this goddamned house.
